Or , a position similar to one LK Advani enjoyed in Atal Bihari Vajpayee 's Cabinet .
Advani , who already has his eye on the post of the Speaker of the 16th Lok Sabha , was the deputy prime minister .

Even Smriti Irani , who gave Rahul Gandhi a tough fight from Amethi , will be on Modi 's radar for a key role .
